thread.title: David Moir
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by David Moir

author: David Moir
title: David Moir
text: I bought some glasses that unfortunately didn't like. Working with their customer service rep Sarah M was very accommodating regarding finding an exchange for a pair I did like. I am very happy with their customer service and would recommend them to anyone interested in buying glasses online!
